text: Kweli, kwa shambi shika mundu jumo, kuwa kushitagwala kwa ligongo lika mundu jumojo, ikabheje imanyishe ukoto kuti shatendile mundu juna, yani a Yeshu Kilishitu, shishipunda kaje. Bhowe bhaaposhelanga nema na upo ja tendwa bhakwete aki, shibhatagwalanje mugumi kupitila mundu jumo a Yeshu Kilishitu.
